headline: The Honest Company (HNST) Stock Is Up, What You Need To Know

headline: Wall Street Analysts Think Amazon (AMZN) Could Surge 30.11%: Read This Before Placing a Bet
summary: The mean of analysts' price targets for Amazon (AMZN) points to a 30.1% upside in the stock. While this highly sought-after metric has not proven reasonably effective, strong agreement among analysts in raising earnings estimates does indicate an upside in the stock.
